      Methods in com.rapidminer.belt.buffer that return TimeBuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static TimeBuffer Buffers.timeBuffer​(int length)
      Creates a buffer of the given length to create a Column of type id Column.TypeId.TIME.
      static TimeBuffer Buffers.timeBuffer​(int length, boolean initialize)
      Creates a buffer of the given length to create a Column of type id Column.TypeId.TIME.
      static TimeBuffer Buffers.timeBuffer​(Column column)
      Creates a buffer to create a Column of type Column.TypeId.TIME by copying the data from the given column.
